pdfPath.fieldDescription: Select the document that the user will download when they submit a filled form.

newsletterPromnptLabel.name: ./newsletterPromptLabel
newsletterPromnptLabel.fieldDescription: Character Limit of 50. This is the checkbox that a user must click in order to be opted-in to receive communications from KG Bank
newsletterPromnptLabel.value: Opt-in to receive monthly newsletters and updates

submissionAltText.name: ./ctaAltText
submissionAltText.fieldDescription: Text that will be read by Screen Readers. If unset, this would be ‘Submit form and download Insights Report PDF’.

formRecipients.fieldDescription: Provide any number of email addresses that the form will be sent to.

label.name: ./email
label.fieldDescription: Email addresses that the form will be sent to.

submitErrorCtaAltText.name: ./submitErrorCtaAltText
submitErrorCtaAltText.fieldDescription: Text that will be read by Screen Readers. If unset, this would be ‘Return to form’.

submitSuccessText.name: ./submitSuccessText
submitSuccessText.value: Your PDF download should begin shortly.

submitSuccessCtaAltText.name: ./submitSuccessCtaAltText
submitSuccessCtaAltText.fieldDescription: Text that will be read by Screen Readers. If unset, this would be ‘Return to form’.
